description:
A free, open source, multi-platform software designed to split, merge, extract pages, mix and rotate PDF files.


- Upgraded bundled JDK to 21.0.9
- Upgraded Sejda SDK
- Updated translations
- Alternate Mix: added a menu entry to set pace for every row
- Fixed an issue with the page range editable column that, once in Edit mode, would let the user move the cursor with the arrow keys
- Merge: Add Footer and Generate ToC options now work with file names including Chinese, Japanese and Korean chars
